DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate two different Parents Teachers curriculum teach parent educator , home visit . The control curriculum include standard PAT lesson ; intervention curriculum include standard PAT lesson plus additional information family live healthy active life reach healthy weight . The investigator hypothesize intervention lesson change way people eat and/or activity level .
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Eating Active Living Taught Home
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim test Healthy Eating & Active Living Taught Home ( HEALTH ) , adapt integrates Diabetes Prevention Program lifestyle intervention within Parents As Teachers ( PAT ) , national home visit program many high need population rely parent-child information service . Specific aim 1 2 evaluate impact HEALTH lifestyle behavior weight obese mother overweight/obese preschool child across multiple PAT region . Specific aim 3 4 address element external validity evaluation factor impact uptake HEALTH within PAT organization . Specific aim 1 . Using group randomize , nested cohort design , evaluate impact HEALTH obese woman ( BMI 30-45 kg/m2 ; age 18-45 old ) randomize either control region receive standard PAT program , intervention region receive HEALTH . Hypothesis 1.1 The primary hypothesis conclusion study , compare control group , participant HEALTH achieve 7 % weight loss 12 month maintain 5 % weight loss 24 month , least two-fold great achieve control group . The secondary hypothesis conclusion study , compare control group , participants HEALTH significantly : Hypothesis 1.2 Improve clinical outcome waist circumference systolic diastolic blood pressure ; Hypothesis 1.3 Improve knowledge evidence-based lifestyle behavior quality life ; Hypothesis 1.4 Decrease caloric intake Hypothesis 1.5 Increase moderate intensity walking . Specific aim 2 . The secondary aim determine whether improvement 'mother child ' behavior HEALTH participant explain part change weight trajectory participant 's overweight ( > 85th percentile ) obese ( > 95th percentile ) preschool child . The hypothesis conclusion study , compare control group : Hypothesis 2.1 There significantly great proportion participant HEALTH group improve child feed practice preschool child ; Hypothesis 2.2 There significantly great proportion preschool child HEALTH group maintain reduce weight measure BMI Z-score . Specific aim 3 . The aim ass provide information external validity HEALTH enhance research translation ( e.g . reach representativeness , program implementation adaptation , decision making outcome , maintenance institutionalization ) . Question 3.1 Are HEALTH adopter representative control PAT participant parent educator ? Question 3.2 Are HEALTH parent educator effectively train deliver intervention ? Question 3.3 Is HEALTH implement design adapted content , consistency , intensity ? Question 3.4 Is HEALTH maintain institutionalized component PAT practice ? Specific aim 4 . The aim determine cost-utility HEALTH decreasing obesity risk diabetes two perspective : service provider state health agency . Question 4.1 Is implementation maintenance HEALTH effective cost-utility perspective participant enrol program agency consider implement program ? Question 4.2 Is HEALTH effective improve health quality , perspective state agency consider funding decision similar program ?
DOC.criteria: female , obese ( BMI 30 45 kg/m2 ) , least one overweight obese preschool child ( > 60th percentile ) living home , plan continue PAT program two year , able give inform consent participate HEALTH . current pregnancy plan become pregnant next 24 month , inability speak English , current enrollment weight loss program , diagnosis and/or undergo treatment diabetes , cardiovascular disease , eat disorder , inability exercise engage walk program .
